Literature.Title: Characterization, mechanism of action and optimization of activity of a novel peptide-peptoid hybrid against bacterial pathogens involved in canine skin infections.
Literature.Author: Greco I, Emborg AP, Jana B, Molchanova N, Oddo A, Damborg P, Guardabassi L, Hansen PR

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=8 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=140 µM,Human erythrocytes:55% Hemolysis=150 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus pseudintermedius C22963(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 26314(MIC=16µg/ml)
